mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY(replyno, replycontents, rdate, rescontentsno, customerno) VALUES(reply_seq.nextval, #{replycontents}, sysdate, #{rescontentsno},#{customerno})
mapper.select: SELECT r.replyno, r.replycontents, r.rdate, r.rescontentsno, r.customerno, c.customerno, c.cname FROM REPLY r INNER JOIN n_customer c ON c.customerno = r.customerno WHERE rescontentsno = #{rescontentsno} ORDER BY r.rdate ASC
